text: Hello Guian.  I have had a look and I really enjoyed it. You certainly have a way more vivid imagination than I do.  What are the next steps?  Do you start to turn this into a storyboard?  Hope you had a lovely Christmas and New Year.
Thank you I hope you too had a great Christmas and happy New Year. The next part of the project involves adding pictures to a recording of me reading the story for an audiovisual narrative video.
